name: Fadli Hastin Al'Anshorry- Electronic Engineering
description: A highly motivated Electrical Engineering student with a strong focus on Internet of Things (IoT) and microcontroller-based systems. Experienced in designing and implementing embedded systems for automation and remote monitoring. Proficient in using SCADA and PLC software for industrial control applications, as well as MATLAB for simulation, data analysis, and system modeling. Passionate about integrating smart technologies to solve real-world engineering problems, with a solid foundation in both hardware and software aspects of control systems.
